blocks.content: Syntax for the class of topological bases.

diff.ctb.c

df-bases
blocks.content: Define the class of topological bases. Equivalent to definition of basis in [Munkres] p. 78 (see ~ isbasis2g ). Note that "bases" is the plural of "basis". (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)

blocks.name: isbasisg
blocks.content: Express the predicate "the set ` B ` is a basis for a topology". (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm isbasisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ctb), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, ctb, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  sseq2d(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-bases(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isbasisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ TopBases ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, ctb, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))))), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, hs0, c0, (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))), (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))))
  sseq2d((s0 ⋂ s1), ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))), hs0 = c0)
  unieqd((hs0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))), (c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))), hs0 = c0)
  ineq1(hs0, c0, P((s0 ⋂ s1)))
  df-bases(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((s0 ⋂ s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  exbii(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s3), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  elin(cv(s3), c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s3), c0), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

  eluni(s3, cv(s2), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  df-rex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cuni.s(s2, cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.cin.s(s2, c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.cpw.s(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cin.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)

  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)

thm isbasis3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, ctb), w3a(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ctb), w3a(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  isbasis2g(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1)
  bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))), w3a(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))), wa(wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  biantrur(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))), wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  pm3.2i(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  rgen(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)))
  elssuni(cv(s0), c0)
  rgen(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eluni2(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  df-3an(wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

blocks.name: basis1
blocks.content: Property of a basis. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm basis1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))))))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))))))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, ctb), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wss(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, ctb), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wss(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))
  isbasisg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctb)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, wss(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wss(cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))))), wss(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1)))))))
  sseq12d(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cin(c1, cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  unieqd(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  pweqd(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  sseq12d(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1))))), cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  unieqd(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1)))), cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1))), cpw(cin(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  pweqd(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), cin(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  ineq2(cv(hs1), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cin(c1, cv(hs1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cin(c1, c2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(c1, c2))))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm basis1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))))
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ TopBases, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))))
  syl5com(c0 ∈ TopBases, (c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((hs0 ⋂ hs1))))))
  ibi(c0 ∈ TopBases, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ⋂ hs1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((hs0 ⋂ hs1))))))
  isbasisg(hs0, hs1, c0, ctb)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, (hs0 ⋂ hs1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((hs0 ⋂ hs1))), (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))), (c1 ⋂ hs1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))))
  sseq12d((hs0 ⋂ hs1), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((hs0 ⋂ hs1))), (c1 ⋂ hs1), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))), hs0 = c1)
  unieqd((c0 ⋂ P((hs0 ⋂ hs1))), (c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))), hs0 = c1)
  ineq2d(c0, P((hs0 ⋂ hs1)), P((c1 ⋂ hs1)), hs0 = c1)
  pweqd((hs0 ⋂ hs1), (c1 ⋂ hs1), hs0 = c1)
  ineq1(hs0, c1, hs1)
  sseq12d((c1 ⋂ hs1), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))), (c1 ⋂ c2), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))), hs1 = c2)
  unieqd((c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))), (c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))), hs1 = c2)
  ineq2d(c0, P((c1 ⋂ hs1)), P((c1 ⋂ c2)), hs1 = c2)
  pweqd((c1 ⋂ hs1), (c1 ⋂ c2), hs1 = c2)
  ineq2(hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⋂ hs1)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P((c1 ⋂ c2))))
}

blocks.name: basis2
blocks.content: Property of a basis. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)

thm basis2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, cin(c1, c2)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  imp43(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, cin(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cin(c1, c2)))))

thm basis2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c1 ∈ c0)∧(c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  imp43(c0 ∈ TopBases, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))
  expd(c0 ∈ TopBases, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c3 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))))
  syl(c0 ∈ TopBases, ((c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c3 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2)))))))
  ibi(c0 ∈ TopBases, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2)))))))
  isbasis2g(hs1, hs2, hs0, s0, c0, ctb)
  syl6com(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2)))))), (c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c3 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))), ∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))))
  rspc2v(hs1, hs2, c1, c0, c2, c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2)))), ∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))), ∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2)))))
  syl(hs1 = c1, (∀(hs0 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2))))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2))))), (hs1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ hs2))
  ineq1(hs1, c1, hs2)
  raleqbi1dv(hs0, (hs1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, (hs1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ hs2), (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2)), (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2)))
  anbi2d((hs1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ hs2), hs0 ∈ s0, s0 ⊆(hs1 ⋂ hs2), s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2))
  sseq2((hs1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ hs2), s0)
  syl(hs2 = c2, (∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2))))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))), (c1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ c2))
  ineq2(hs2, c2, c1)
  raleqbi1dv(hs0, (c1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, (c1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ c2), (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2)), (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  anbi2d((c1 ⋂ hs2)=(c1 ⋂ c2), hs0 ∈ s0, s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2), s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))
  sseq2((c1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ c2), s0)
  rspccv(hs0, (c1 ⋂ c2), c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)), (c3 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))

  diff.hs1.w(∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ hs2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ hs2)))))
  diff.hs2.w(∀(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆(c1 ⋂ c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c((hs1 ⋂ hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ hs2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ hs2))
  diff.cin.s(s0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)

  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c1 ⋂ hs2), (c1 ⋂ c2))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, hs2)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: fiinbas
blocks.content: If a set is closed under finite intersection, then it is a basis for a topology. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)

thm fiinbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))), wcel(c0, ctb))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(c0, ctb))
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(c0, ctb), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wral(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  ralimdv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  ralimdv(s1, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wral(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wral(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpanr2(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ssid(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  rspcev(hs1, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eleq2(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))
  sseq1(cv(hs1), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  isbasis2g(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm fiinbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0)))→ c0 ∈ TopBases)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0)), c0 ∈ TopBases)
  sylibrd(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0)), c0 ∈ TopBases, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1)))))))
  ralimdv(s0, c0, c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))))))
  ralimdv(s1, c0, c0 ∈ c1, (s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1)))))
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ((s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0 → ∀(hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))))
  mpanr2((s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0, hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))), (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))
  ssid((s0 ⋂ s1))
  rspcev(hs1, (s0 ⋂ s1), c0, (hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1)∧(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆(s0 ⋂ s1)), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1)))
  anbi12d(hs1 =(s0 ⋂ s1), hs0 ∈ hs1, hs1 ⊆(s0 ⋂ s1), hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ⋂ s1)⊆(s0 ⋂ s1))
  eleq2(hs1, (s0 ⋂ s1), hs0)
  sseq1(hs1, (s0 ⋂ s1), (s0 ⋂ s1))
  isbasis2g(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ⋂ s1)∈ c0)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ⋂ s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0 ∈(s0 ⋂ s1)∧(s0 ⋂ s1)⊆(s0 ⋂ s1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)

blocks.name: baspartn
blocks.content: A disjoint system of sets is a basis for a topology. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm baspartn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))), wcel(c0, ctb))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))), wcel(c0, ctb), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  ralimia(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  ralimdv(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  jaod(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl5ibcom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))
  elind(cv(s0), c0, cpw(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  pwidg(cv(s0), c0)
  elssuni(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))
  sseq12d(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  unieqd(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  pweqd(cv(s0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl5eqr(cv(s0), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  inidm(cv(s0))
  ineq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s0))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  mpbiri(wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wss(emptycls, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  0ss(cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wb(wcel(c0, ctb), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))

blocks.name: tgval
blocks.content: The topology generated by a basis. See also ~ tgval2 and ~ tgval3 . (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, ctg, c0, cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe, cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-topgen(hs0, s0)
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  elex(c0, c1)
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  abssexg(s0, cuni(c0), universe, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0)))))
  mpan(wcel(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe), wss(cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  ss2abi(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))))
  sylibr(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))))
  mpan2(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))), wss(cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))))
  uniin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  sstr(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0)))))
  ssin(cv(s0), cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0))))
  ssexg(cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cpw(cv(s0)))))), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(topGen ` c0)= { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))})
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(topGen ` c0)= { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))}), d(s0, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, ctg, c0, { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))}, universe, { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P(s0))}, universe, c0 ∈ c1)
  df-topgen(hs0, s0)
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P(s0)), s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))
  sseq2d(s0, ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P(s0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), hs0 = c0)
  unieqd((hs0 ⋂ P(s0)), (c0 ⋂ P(s0)), hs0 = c0)
  ineq1(hs0, c0, P(s0))
  elex(c0, c1)
  3syl(c0 ∈ c1, { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))} ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { s0 |(s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0))} ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  abssexg(s0, ⋃ c0, universe, s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0))
  mpan({ s0 |(s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0))} ∈ 𝕌, { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))} ∈ 𝕌, { s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))} ⊆ { s0 |(s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0))})
  ss2abi(s0, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), (s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0)))
  sylibr(s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), (s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0)), s0 ⊆(⋃ c0 ⋂ ⋃ P(s0)))
  mpan2(s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), s0 ⊆(⋃ c0 ⋂ ⋃ P(s0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))⊆(⋃ c0 ⋂ ⋃ P(s0)))
  uniin(c0, P(s0))
  sstr(s0, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), (⋃ c0 ⋂ ⋃ P(s0)))
  ssin(s0, ⋃ c0, ⋃ P(s0))
  ssexg({ s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))}, { s0 |(s0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ s0 ⊆ ⋃ P(s0))}, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))})
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

  3bitr4i(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), wa(wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  bitri(wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), wa(wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  ralbii(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0)))
  sseli(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), cuni(c0))
  unissi(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), c0)

  r19.26(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))
  dfss3(s1, cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))
  anbi12i(wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(c0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  dfss3(s1, cv(s0), cuni(c0))
  ralbii(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))
  bitr2i(wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  exbii(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  elin(cv(s2), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  an12(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))))
  eluni(s2, cv(s1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))
  df-rex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0)))))

  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  selpw(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))

  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(s0))

blocks.name: eltg
blocks.content: Membership in a topology generated by a basis. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))))))
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(ctg, c0), cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  tgval(hs0, c0, c1)
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))), wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylan2(wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))), universe))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))), universe), wcel(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), universe))
  inex1g(c0, c1, cpw(c2))
  uniexg(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), universe)
  ssexg(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))), universe)
  elabg(hs0, c2, universe, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))), wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))))
  sseq12d(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))), c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieqd(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈(topGen ` c0)↔ c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2))))
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 ∈ { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))})
  eleq2d(c2, (topGen ` c0), { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))}, c0 ∈ c1)
  tgval(hs0, c0, c1)
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))}, c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))}, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c2, { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))})
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylan2(c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2))∈ 𝕌)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2))∈ 𝕌, (c0 ⋂ P(c2))∈ 𝕌)
  inex1g(c0, c1, P(c2))
  uniexg((c0 ⋂ P(c2)), universe)
  ssexg(c2, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), universe)
  elabg(hs0, c2, universe, hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  sseq12d(hs0, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), c2, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), hs0 = c2)
  id(hs0 = c2)
  unieqd((c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), (c0 ⋂ P(c2)), hs0 = c2)
  ineq2d(c0, P(hs0), P(c2), hs0 = c2)
  pweq(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
}

thm eltg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(ctg, c0), cab(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  tgval2(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))), wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, cab(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylan2(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, cuni(c0), universe)
  elabg(hs0, c2, universe, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c2, cuni(c0))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s1), c2))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈(topGen ` c0)↔(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))), c2 ∈ { hs0 |(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))))})
  eleq2d(c2, (topGen ` c0), { hs0 |(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))))}, c0 ∈ c1)
  tgval2(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ { hs0 |(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))))}, (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ { hs0 |(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))))}, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c2, { hs0 |(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))))})
  adantrr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylan2(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, ⋃ c0, universe)
  elabg(hs0, c2, universe, (hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0)))), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0))), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))))
  sseq1(hs0, c2, ⋃ c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, hs0 = c2, (s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ hs0), (s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c2, s0 ∈ s1, s1 ⊆ hs0, s1 ⊆ c2)
  sseq2(hs0, c2, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eltg2b
blocks.content: Membership in a topology generated by a basis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltg2b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))
  eltg2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm4.71ri(wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))), wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  sylibr(wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0))))
  ralimi(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)))
  sylibr(wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  reximi(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))
  eluni2(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  dfss3(s0, c2, cuni(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltg2b(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈(topGen ` c0)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))
  eltg2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm4.71ri(∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  sylibr(∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ⋃ c0))
  ralimi(s0, c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)), s0 ∈ ⋃ c0)
  sylibr(∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)), s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1))
  reximi(s1, c0, (s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2), s0 ∈ s1)
  simpl(s0 ∈ s1, s1 ⊆ c2)
  eluni2(s1, s0, c0)
  dfss3(s0, c2, ⋃ c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: eltg4i
blocks.content: An open set in a topology generated by a basis is the union of all basic open sets contained in it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltg4i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wceq(c0, cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0)))))
} = {
  eqssd(c0, cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0))))), wcel(c1, cdm(ctg)))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  eltg(c1, cdm(ctg), c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0))), c0))
  sseqtri(cuni(cin(c1, cpw(c0))), c0, cuni(cpw(c0)))
  unissi(cin(c1, cpw(c0)), cpw(c0))
  inss2(c1, cpw(c0))
  unipw(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltg4i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(topGen ` c1)→ c0 = ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0)))
} = {
  eqssd(c0, ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0)), c0 ∈(topGen ` c1))
  ibi(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), c0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0)))
  syl(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), (c0 ∈(topGen ` c1)↔ c0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0))), c1 ∈ dom(topGen))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  eltg(c1, dom(topGen), c0)
  a1i(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0))⊆ c0)
  sseqtri(⋃(c1 ⋂ P(c0)), c0, ⋃ P(c0))
  unissi((c1 ⋂ P(c0)), P(c0))
  inss2(c1, P(c0))
  unipw(c0)
}

blocks.name: eltg3i
blocks.content: The union of a set of basic open sets is in the generated topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: eltg3
blocks.content: Membership in a topology generated by a basis. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltg3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))))))
  elabd(s0, cin(c0, cpw(c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0)))), wceq(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))))
  syl(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ctg)))
  elfvdm(c2, ctg, c0)
  inex1g(c0, cdm(ctg), cpw(c2))
  eltg4i(c2, c0)
  bitr3d(wceq(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0)))), wceq(c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2)))), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))))
  biantrurd(wceq(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cin(c0, cpw(c2)), c0))
  inss1(c0, cpw(c2))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2)), c0)
  eqeq2d(c2, cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))), wceq(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2))))
  unieq(cv(s0), cin(c0, cpw(c2)))
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  expimpd(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  eltg3i(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  eleq1(c2, cuni(cv(s0)), cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, cuni(cin(c0, cpw(c2))))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cin(c0, cpw(c2)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, cpw(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c0)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltg3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈(topGen ` c0)↔ ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), ∃(s0,(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ s0)))
  elabd(s0, (c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ s0), c2 = ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  syl(c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), (c0 ⋂ P(c2))∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ dom(topGen))
  elfvdm(c2, ctg, c0)
  inex1g(c0, dom(topGen), P(c2))
  eltg4i(c2, c0)
  bitr3d(s0 =(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ s0), c2 = ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 = ⋃ s0)
  biantrurd(s0 =(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c2 = ⋃ s0, s0 ⊆ c0)
  mpbiri(s0 =(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), s0 ⊆ c0, (c0 ⋂ P(c2))⊆ c0)
  inss1(c0, P(c2))
  sseq1(s0, (c0 ⋂ P(c2)), c0)
  eqeq2d(c2, ⋃ s0, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)), s0 =(c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  unieq(s0, (c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ∈ c1, (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ s0), c2 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  expimpd(c0 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ c0, c2 = ⋃ s0, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0), c2 = ⋃ s0, c2 ∈(topGen ` c0), ⋃ s0 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  eltg3i(c0, c1, s0)
  eleq1(c2, ⋃ s0, (topGen ` c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, (c0 ⋂ P(c2)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, P(c2))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (topGen ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c0)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tgval3
blocks.content: Alternate expression for the topology generated by a basis. Lemma 2.1 of [Munkres] p. 80. See also ~ tgval and ~ tgval2 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgval3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  abbi2dv(s0, cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))
  eltg3(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c0)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgval3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(topGen ` c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  abbi2dv(s0, (topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1)))
  eltg3(s1, c0, c1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c0)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: tg1
blocks.content: Property of a member of a topology generated by a basis. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm tg1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
} = {
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(ctg)))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  simprbda(wcel(c1, cdm(ctg)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  eltg2(hs0, hs1, c1, cdm(ctg), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(ctg))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(ctg))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tg1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(topGen ` c1)→ c0 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
} = {
  mpancom(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c1, c1 ∈ dom(topGen))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  simprbda(c1 ∈ dom(topGen), c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆ c0))))
  eltg2(hs0, hs1, c1, dom(topGen), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(topGen))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(dom(topGen))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: tg2
blocks.content: Property of a member of a topology generated by a basis. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm tg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0)))), wcel(c1, cdm(ctg)))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  syl6bi(wcel(c1, cdm(ctg)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0)))))
  eltg2b(hs0, s0, c1, cdm(ctg), c0)
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(ctg))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, ctg)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(topGen ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), c2 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  mpcom(c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), (c2 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0))), c1 ∈ dom(topGen))
  elfvdm(c0, ctg, c1)
  syl6bi(c1 ∈ dom(topGen), c0 ∈(topGen ` c1), (c2 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0))))
  eltg2b(hs0, s0, c1, dom(topGen), c0)
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c2, (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0), (c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ∈ s0, s0 ⊆ c0, c2 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(topGen))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, ctg)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ⊆ c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bastg
blocks.content: A member of a basis is a subset of the topology it generates. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm bastg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))))

thm bastg(class c0, class c1) {

  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  elind(hs0, c0, P(hs0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ P(hs0))

blocks.name: unitg
blocks.content: The topology generated by a basis ` B ` is a topology on ` U. B ` . Importantly, this theorem means that we don't have to specify separately the base set for the topological space generated by a basis. In other words, any member of the class ` TopBases ` completely specifies the basis it corresponds to. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 30-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm unitg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(cfv(ctg, c0)), cuni(c0)))
} = {
  eqssd(cuni(cfv(ctg, c0)), cuni(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cuni(cfv(ctg, c0)), cuni(c0)))
  mpbi(wss(cuni(cfv(ctg, c0)), cuni(c0)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  ssriv(hs0, cfv(ctg, c0), cpw(cuni(c0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  tg1(cv(hs0), c0)
  selpw(hs0, cuni(c0))
  sspwuni(cfv(ctg, c0), cuni(c0))
  unissd(c0, cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  bastg(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}

thm unitg(class c0, class c1) {

  ssriv(hs0, (topGen ` c0), P(⋃ c0))
  sylibr(hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs0 ∈ P(⋃ c0), hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  tg1(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, ⋃ c0)

  diff.hs0.c(P(⋃ c0))

}

blocks.name: tgclb
blocks.content: The property ~ tgcl can be reversed: if the topology generated by ` B ` is actually a topology, then ` B ` must be a topological basis. This yields an alternative definition of ` TopBases ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgclb(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
  tgcl(c0)
  mpbird(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wcel(c0, ctb), wral(hs2, c0, wral(hs3, c0, wral(hs0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))))))
  ralrimivva(hs2, hs3, c0, c0, wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wral(hs0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs3), c0))), wral(hs0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))), wcel(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  syldan(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs3), c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(ctg, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  anim12dan(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs3), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  sselda(cv(hs2), c0, cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
  sselda(cv(hs3), c0, cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
  syl(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  bastg(c0, universe)
  3expb(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  inopn(cfv(ctg, c0), cv(hs2), cv(hs3))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wcel(cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(ctg, c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))
  tg2(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop), wb(wcel(c0, ctb), wral(hs2, c0, wral(hs3, c0, wral(hs0, cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elfvexd(c0, emptycls, ctg, wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
  0opn(cfv(ctg, c0))
  isbasis2g(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, c0, universe)

  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), ctop))

thm tgclb(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopBases ↔(topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
} = {
  impbii(c0 ∈ TopBases, (topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  tgcl(c0)
  mpbird((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, c0 ∈ TopBases, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs3 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs2 ⋂ hs3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(hs2 ⋂ hs3)))))))
  ralrimivva(hs2, hs3, c0, c0, (topGen ` c0)∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs2 ⋂ hs3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(hs2 ⋂ hs3)))))
  syl(((topGen ` c0)∈ Top ∧(hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ hs3 ∈ c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈(hs2 ⋂ hs3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(hs2 ⋂ hs3)))), (hs2 ⋂ hs3)∈(topGen ` c0))
  syldan((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, (hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ hs3 ∈ c0), (hs2 ⋂ hs3)∈(topGen ` c0), (hs2 ∈(topGen ` c0)∧ hs3 ∈(topGen ` c0)))
  anim12dan((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, hs2 ∈ c0, hs3 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs3 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  sselda(hs2, c0, (topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  sselda(hs3, c0, (topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  syl((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  bastg(c0, universe)
  3expb((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, hs2 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs3 ∈(topGen ` c0), (hs2 ⋂ hs3)∈(topGen ` c0))
  inopn((topGen ` c0), hs2, hs3)
  ralrimiva(hs0, (hs2 ⋂ hs3), (hs2 ⋂ hs3)∈(topGen ` c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(hs2 ⋂ hs3))))
  tg2(hs1, (hs2 ⋂ hs3), c0, hs0)
  syl((topGen ` c0)∈ Top, (c0 ∈ TopBases ↔ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs3 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈(hs2 ⋂ hs3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(hs2 ⋂ hs3))))))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elfvexd(c0, emptycls, ctg, (topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  0opn((topGen ` c0))
  isbasis2g(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, c0, universe)

  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w((topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  diff.hs3.w((topGen ` c0)∈ Top)
  diff.hs0.w((hs2 ⋂ hs3)∈(topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((hs2 ⋂ hs3))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), c0))
  uniopn(c0, cv(hs1))
  bastg(c0, ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgtop(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(topGen ` c0)= c0)
} = {
  eqssd((topGen ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  ssrdv(hs0, (topGen ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  sylbid(c0 ∈ Top, hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1)))
  eltg3(hs1, c0, ctop, hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, c0 ∈ Top, (hs1 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1), hs0 ∈ c0)
  expl(c0 ∈ Top, hs1 ⊆ c0, hs0 = ⋃ hs1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd(hs0, c0, ⋃ hs1, ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs1 ⊆ c0)∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1))
  simpr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs1 ⊆ c0), hs0 = ⋃ hs1)
  adantr((c0 ∈ Top ∧ hs1 ⊆ c0), hs0 = ⋃ hs1, ⋃ hs1 ∈ c0)
  uniopn(c0, hs1)
  bastg(c0, ctop)
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ Top)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: eltop2
blocks.content: Membership in a topology. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2006.)

thm eltop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr3d(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c1)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(ctg, c0), c0, wcel(c0, ctop))
  tgtop(c0)
  eltg2b(s0, s1, c0, ctop, c1)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.ctop.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eltop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(c1 ∈ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr3d(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c1))), c1 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  eleq2d(c1, (topGen ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  tgtop(c0)
  eltg2b(s0, s1, c0, ctop, c1)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.ctop.s(s1)
}

  fiinbas(hs0, hs1, cfv(cfi, c0), universe)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: tgdom
blocks.content: A space has no more open sets than subsets of a basis. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgdom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(ctg, c0), cdom, cpw(c0)))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(ctg, c0), cdom, cpw(c0)), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  dom2(hs0, hs1, cpw(c0), universe, cfv(ctg, c0), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cpw(c0)))
  mpbir(wcel(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cpw(c0)), wss(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), c0))
  inss1(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))
  elpw(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), c0)
  inex2(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))
  vpwex(hs0)
  impbid1(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  3eqtr4d(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  unieq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))
  eltg4i(cv(hs0), c0)
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  eltg4i(cv(hs1), c0)
  ineq2d(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))
}

thm tgdom(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(topGen ` c0)[≼]P(c0))
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (topGen ` c0)[≼]P(c0), P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  dom2(hs0, hs1, P(c0), universe, (topGen ` c0), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), (c0 ⋂ P(hs1)))
  a1i(hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))∈ P(c0))
  mpbir((c0 ⋂ P(hs0))∈ P(c0), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))⊆ c0)
  inss1(c0, P(hs0))
  elpw((c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), c0)
  inex2(c0, P(hs0))
  vpwex(hs0)
  impbid1((hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0)), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), hs0 = hs1)
  ex((hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0)), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), hs0 = hs1)
  3eqtr4d(hs0, hs1, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), ((hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0))∧(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1))))
  adantl((hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0)∧ hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0)), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))= ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)))
  unieq((c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), (c0 ⋂ P(hs1)))
  ad2antrr(hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), hs0 = ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  eltg4i(hs0, c0)
  ad2antlr(hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0), (c0 ⋂ P(hs0))=(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)), hs1 = ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs1)))
  eltg4i(hs1, c0)
  ineq2d(c0, P(hs0), P(hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  pweq(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ P(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
}

blocks.name: tgiun
blocks.content: The indexed union of a set of basic open sets is in the generated topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(ciun(s0, c2, c3), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(ciun(s0, c2, c3), cfv(ctg, c0))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  eqeltrd(ciun(s0, c2, c3), cfv(ctg, c0), cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wceq(ciun(s0, c2, c3), cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))))
  dfiun3g(s0, c2, c3, c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), c0))
  rnmptss(s0, c2, c3, c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  eltg3i(c0, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c0))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, c3)∈(topGen ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c0))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, c3)∈(topGen ` c0)), d(s0, c1))
  eqeltrd(⋃(s0 ∈ c2, c3), (topGen ` c0), ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c0)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, c3)= ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  dfiun3g(s0, c2, c3, c0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c0), ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))∈(topGen ` c0), ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))⊆ c0)
  rnmptss(s0, c2, c3, c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  eltg3i(c0, c1, ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
}

thm tgidm(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  eqssd(cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0)), cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0)), cfv(ctg, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wex(hs1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0))), wex(hs1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), universe))
  eltg3(hs1, cfv(ctg, c0), universe, cv(hs0))
  exlimdv(hs1, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  expimpd(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  eqeltrd(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ctg, c0), cuni(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  syl6eq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  syl5eq(cuni(cv(hs1)), ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  uniiun(hs2, cv(hs1))
  iuneq2dv(hs2, cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  sselda(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  eltg4i(cv(hs2), c0)
  iuncom4(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(cuni(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))))), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))), c0))
  a1i(wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))), c0))
  mpbir(wss(ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))), c0), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))), c0)))
  rgenw(hs2, cv(hs1), wss(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))), c0))
  inss1(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))
  iunss(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2))), c0)
  eltg3i(c0, c1, ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs2)))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ctg, c0))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0))), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), universe), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  fvex(ctg, c0)
  bastg(c0, c1)
  tgss(cfv(ctg, c0), universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgidm(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(topGen `(topGen ` c0))=(topGen ` c0))
} = {
  eqssd((topGen `(topGen ` c0)), (topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  ssrdv(hs0, (topGen `(topGen ` c0)), (topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5bi(c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(topGen `(topGen ` c0)), hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1)))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈(topGen `(topGen ` c0))↔ ∃(hs1,(hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1))), (topGen ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  eltg3(hs1, (topGen ` c0), universe, hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, c0 ∈ c1, (hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)∧ hs0 = ⋃ hs1), hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  expimpd(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), hs0 = ⋃ hs1, hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)), hs0 = ⋃ hs1, hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0), ⋃ hs1 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  eqeltrd(⋃ hs1, (topGen ` c0), ⋃ ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  syl6eq(⋃ hs1, ⋃ ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))), ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  syl5eq(⋃ hs1, ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))), ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1, hs2), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  uniiun(hs2, hs1)
  iuneq2dv(hs2, hs1, hs2, ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  syl(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))∧ hs2 ∈ hs1), hs2 = ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)), hs2 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  sselda(hs2, hs1, (topGen ` c0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  eltg4i(hs2, c0)
  iuncom4(hs2, hs1, (c0 ⋂ P(hs2)))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), ⋃ ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)))∈(topGen ` c0), ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)))⊆ c0)
  a1i(hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)))⊆ c0)
  mpbir(⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2)))⊆ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))⊆ c0))
  rgenw(hs2, hs1, (c0 ⋂ P(hs2))⊆ c0)
  inss1(c0, P(hs2))
  iunss(hs2, hs1, (c0 ⋂ P(hs2)), c0)
  eltg3i(c0, c1, ⋃(hs2 ∈ hs1,(c0 ⋂ P(hs2))))
  eleq1(hs0, ⋃ hs1, (topGen ` c0))
  sylancr(c0 ∈ c1, (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen `(topGen ` c0)), (topGen ` c0)∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  fvex(ctg, c0)
  bastg(c0, c1)
  tgss((topGen ` c0), universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((topGen `(topGen ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs1.c((topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈(topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: bastop
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a basis is a topology. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)

blocks.name: tgtop11
blocks.content: The topology generation function is one-to-one when applied to completed topologies. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)

blocks.name: 0top
blocks.content: The singleton of the empty set is the only topology possible for an empty underlying set. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0top(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wceq(cuni(c0), emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls))))
} = {
  syl6rbb(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cuni(c0), emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  impbid2(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  olc(wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  jaod(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  pm2.21d(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  0opn(c0)
  n0i(emptycls, c0)
  idd(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  bitr2i(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls))), wceq(cuni(c0), emptycls), wss(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  uni0b(c0)
  sssn(c0, emptycls)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0top(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(⋃ c0 = ∅ ↔ c0 = { ∅ }))
} = {
  syl6rbb(c0 ∈ Top, ⋃ c0 = ∅, c0 = { ∅ }, (c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { ∅ }))
  impbid2(c0 ∈ Top, c0 = { ∅ }, (c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { ∅ }))
  olc(c0 = { ∅ }, c0 = ∅)
  jaod(c0 ∈ Top, c0 = ∅, c0 = { ∅ }, c0 = { ∅ })
  pm2.21d(c0 ∈ Top, c0 = ∅, c0 = { ∅ })
  syl(c0 ∈ Top, ¬ c0 = ∅, ∅ ∈ c0)
  0opn(c0)
  n0i(emptycls, c0)
  idd(c0 ∈ Top, c0 = { ∅ })
  bitr2i((c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { ∅ }), ⋃ c0 = ∅, c0 ⊆ { ∅ })
  uni0b(c0)
  sssn(c0, emptycls)
}

blocks.name: en1top
blocks.content: ` { (/) } ` is the only topology with one element. (Contributed by FL, 18-Aug-2008.)

blocks.name: en2top
blocks.content: If a topology has two elements, it is the indiscrete topology. (Contributed by FL, 11-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm en2top(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))))
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(emptycls, c1))
  necomd(emptycls, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wi(wne(emptycls, c1), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1))), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wcel(c1, c0))
  en2eqpr(c0, emptycls, c1)
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  necon2ad(c1, emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c2o)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wbr(c0, csdm, c2o))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wbr(c0, csdm, c2o), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1o)))
  olcd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1o))
  syl6eqbr(c0, cen, c1o, csn(emptycls), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  eqssd(c0, csn(emptycls), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, csn(emptycls), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wa(wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wa(wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  toponss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseq0(cv(hs0), c1)
  velsn(hs0, emptycls)
  snssd(emptycls, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  0opn(c0)
  ensn1(emptycls)
  sdom2en01(c0)
  sdomnen(c0, c2o)
  eqbrtrd(c0, cen, c2o, cpr(emptycls, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  mp3an2ani(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls)), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c1), cen, c2o), wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(c1, c0), wne(emptycls, c1))
  0ex()
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  necomd(emptycls, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  pr2nelem(emptycls, universe, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(emptycls))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wceq(c1, emptycls)))

blocks.pretty:
thm en2top(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(c0[≅]2o ↔(c0 = { ∅, c1 } ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)))
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o, (c0 = { ∅, c1 } ∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  jca((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c0 = { ∅, c1 }, c1 ≠ ∅)
  mpd((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c0 = { ∅, c1 }, ∅ ≠ c1)
  necomd(emptycls, c1, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), (∅ ≠ c1 → c0 = { ∅, c1 }), c0[≅]2o, ∅ ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o, ∅ ∈ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o, c1 ∈ c0)
  en2eqpr(c0, emptycls, c1)
  mpd((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c1 ≠ ∅, c0[≅]2o)
  simpr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o)
  necon2ad(c1, emptycls, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c0[≅]2o)
  ex((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c1 = ∅, ¬ c0[≅]2o)
  syl(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅), ¬ c0[≅]2o, c0[≺]2o)
  sylibr(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅), c0[≺]2o, (c0 = ∅ ∨ c0[≅]1o))
  olcd(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅), c0 = ∅, c0[≅]1o)
  syl6eqbr(c0, cen, c1o, { ∅ }, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅))
  eqssd(c0, { ∅ }, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅))
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, { ∅ }, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅))
  expr((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c1 = ∅, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { ∅ })
  sylibr(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧(c1 = ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)), hs0 ∈ { ∅ }, hs0 = ∅)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧(c1 = ∅ ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)), hs0 = ∅, hs0 ⊆ c1, c1 = ∅)
  ad2ant2rl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o, c1 = ∅, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  toponss(c0, c1, hs0)
  simprl((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o), c1 = ∅, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sseq0(hs0, c1)
  velsn(hs0, emptycls)
  snssd(emptycls, c0, ((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0[≅]2o, c1 = ∅, ∅ ∈ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), ∅ ∈ c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  0opn(c0)
  ensn1(emptycls)
  sdom2en01(c0)
  sdomnen(c0, c2o)
  eqbrtrd(c0, cen, c2o, { ∅, c1 }, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧(c0 = { ∅, c1 } ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)))
  simprl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 = { ∅, c1 }, c1 ≠ ∅)
  mp3an2ani(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), (c0 = { ∅, c1 } ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), { ∅, c1 }[≅]2o, ∅ ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c0, ∅ ≠ c1)
  0ex()
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  necomd(emptycls, c1, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧(c0 = { ∅, c1 } ∧ c1 ≠ ∅)))
  simprr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 = { ∅, c1 }, c1 ≠ ∅)
  pr2nelem(emptycls, universe, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ ∅ })
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0[≅]2o)∧ c1 = ∅))
}

blocks.name: tgss3
blocks.content: A criterion for determining whether one topology is finer than another. Lemma 2.2 of [Munkres] p. 80 using abbreviations. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgss3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2))), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  bastg(c0, c1)
  sstr2(c0, cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c2))))
  mpan(wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c2))), wcel(cfv(ctg, c2), universe))
  fvex(ctg, c2)
  tgss(cfv(ctg, c2), universe, c0)
  sseq2d(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c2)), cfv(ctg, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(ctg, cfv(ctg, c2)), cfv(ctg, c2)))
  tgidm(c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgss3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)↔ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2)))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), ((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)→ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2)), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  bastg(c0, c1)
  sstr2(c0, (topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c2))
  syl5ib((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen `(topGen ` c2)))
  mpan(c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen `(topGen ` c2)), (topGen ` c2)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(ctg, c2)
  tgss((topGen ` c2), universe, c0)
  sseq2d((topGen ` c0), (topGen `(topGen ` c2)), (topGen ` c2), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (topGen `(topGen ` c2))=(topGen ` c2))
  tgidm(c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: tgss2
blocks.content: A criterion for determining whether one topology is finer than another, based on a comparison of their bases. Lemma 2.2 of [Munkres] p. 80. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))

  ralbidva(s1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, cv(s1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  sylan9bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, cv(s1), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wrex(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c2, universe))
