thm tgss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)→((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)→((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)→((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))))), d(s2, c0))
  bitrd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2))
  syldan(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2, ((topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c2)↔ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  tgss3(c0, c1, c2, universe)
  3bitr4g((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(topGen ` c2)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), s1 ∈(topGen ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))))
  syl6bb(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)∧ s1 ∈ c0), s1 ∈(topGen ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ s1,(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))))
  sylan9bb((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(topGen ` c2), ∀(s0 ∈ s1,(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ s1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), (s1 ∈(topGen ` c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ s1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrrd(⋃ c2, universe, ⋃ c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  eltg2b(s0, s2, c2, universe, s1)
  ralbidva(s0, s1, s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)), (s0 ∈ ⋃ c0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))
  syl((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ s1), (∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))↔(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))), s0 ∈ ⋃ c0)
  ancoms(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1, s0 ∈ ⋃ c0)
  elunii(s0, s1, c0)
  biimt(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))
  ralcom3(s0, s1, ⋃ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1)))
  dfss3(s1, c0, (topGen ` c2))
  ralcom(s0, s1, ⋃ c0, c0, (s0 ∈ s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s0 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, ⋃ c0, ⋃ c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c2)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctg, c2)
  diff.ctg.s(s1)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: basgen
blocks.content: Given a topology ` J ` , show that a subset ` B ` satisfying the third antecedent is a basis for it. Lemma 2.3 of [Munkres] p. 81 using abbreviations. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: basgen2
blocks.content: Given a topology ` J ` , show that a subset ` B ` satisfying the third antecedent is a basis for it. Lemma 2.3 of [Munkres] p. 81. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)

thm basgen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), diffsc(s2, c0))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  biimp3ar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1))))
  dfss3(s0, c0, cfv(ctg, c1))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssexg(c1, c0, ctop)
  eltg2b(s1, s2, c1, universe, cv(s0))
  basgen(c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c1)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm basgen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))))→(topGen ` c1)= c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))))→(topGen ` c1)= c0), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))))→(topGen ` c1)= c0), d(s2, c0))
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))), (topGen ` c1)= c0, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
  biimp3ar(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(topGen ` c1)))
  dfss3(s0, c0, (topGen ` c1))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), s0 ∈(topGen ` c1), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0))))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (s0 ∈(topGen ` c1)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexg(c1, c0, ctop)
  eltg2b(s1, s2, c1, universe, s0)
  basgen(c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c1)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: 2basgen
blocks.content: Conditions that determine the equality of two generated topologies. (Contributed by NM, 8-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2basgen(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))))
  syl2an2(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wss(c0, c1))
  simpl(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  tgss(c1, universe, c0)
  mpbird(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))), wss(cfv(ctg, c1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  simpr(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  syl2an2(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c1), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylan2(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssex(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))
  fvex(ctg, c0)
  ssexg(c0, c1, universe)
  tgss3(c1, universe, c0, universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2basgen(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))→(topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c1))
} = {
  eqssd((topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c1), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  syl2an2(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c0)⊆(topGen ` c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆ c1)
  simpl(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  tgss(c1, universe, c0)
  mpbird((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)), (topGen ` c1)⊆(topGen ` c0), c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  simpr(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  syl2an2(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), ((topGen ` c1)⊆(topGen ` c0)↔ c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0)), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylan2(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆(topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssex(c1, (topGen ` c0))
  fvex(ctg, c0)
  ssexg(c0, c1, universe)
  tgss3(c1, universe, c0, universe)
}

blocks.name: tgfiss
blocks.content: If a subbase is included into a topology, so is the generated topology. (Contributed by FL, 20-Apr-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: tgdif0
blocks.content: A generated topology is not affected by the addition or removal of the empty set from the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgdif0(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cfv(ctg, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cfv(ctg, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cfv(ctg, c0), cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0)))))), cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  abbii(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0))))), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))))
  sseq2i(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))))
  eqtri(cuni(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0)))), cuni(cdif(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), csn(emptycls))))
  unieqi(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0))), cdif(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))), csn(emptycls)))
  indif1(c0, csn(emptycls), cpw(cv(hs0)))
  unidif0(cin(c0, cpw(cv(hs0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cab(hs0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cv(hs0))))))), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe))
  difexg(c0, universe, csn(emptycls))
  tgval(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe)
  tgval(hs0, c0, universe)
  eqtr4d(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cfv(ctg, c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(ctg, cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), emptycls), wn(wcel(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe)))
  con3i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe))
  difsnexi(c0, emptycls)
  fvprc(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), ctg)
  fvprc(c0, ctg)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgdif0(class c0) {
  ⊢ (topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ }))=(topGen ` c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ }))=(topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  3eqtr4a((topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ })), (topGen ` c0), { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0))}, { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0))}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  abbii(hs0, hs0 ⊆ ⋃((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0)), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  sseq2i(hs0, ⋃((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  eqtri(⋃((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(hs0)), ⋃((c0 ⋂ P(hs0))\ { ∅ }))
  unieqi(((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0)), ((c0 ⋂ P(hs0))\ { ∅ }))
  indif1(c0, { ∅ }, P(hs0))
  unidif0((c0 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  syl(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ }))= { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ ⋃((c0 \ { ∅ })⋂ P(hs0))}, (c0 \ { ∅ })∈ 𝕌)
  difexg(c0, universe, { ∅ })
  tgval(hs0, (c0 \ { ∅ }), universe)
  tgval(hs0, c0, universe)
  eqtr4d((topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ })), (topGen ` c0), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, (topGen `(c0 \ { ∅ }))= ∅, ¬(c0 \ { ∅ })∈ 𝕌)
  con3i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 \ { ∅ })∈ 𝕌)
  difsnexi(c0, emptycls)
  fvprc((c0 \ { ∅ }), ctg)
  fvprc(c0, ctg)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 \ { ∅ }))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: bastop1
blocks.content: A subset of a topology is a basis for the topology iff every member of the topology is a union of members of the basis. We use the idiom " ` ( topGen `` B ) = J ` " to express " ` B ` is a basis for topology ` J ` " since we do not have a separate notation for this. Definition 15.35 of [Schechter] p. 428. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm bastop1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1))))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1))), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))), wss(cfv(ctg, c1), c0))
  sseqtrd(cfv(ctg, c1), c0, cfv(ctg, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)))
  tgss(c0, ctop, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), c0))
  tgtop(c0)
  baib(wss(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  eqss(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)
  dfss3(s0, c0, cfv(ctg, c1))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssexg(c1, c0, ctop)
  eltg3(s1, c1, universe, cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c1)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bastop1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→((topGen ` c1)= c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→((topGen ` c1)= c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))))), d(s1, c0))
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (topGen ` c1)= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(topGen ` c1)))
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (topGen ` c1)= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(topGen ` c1)), c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ((topGen ` c1)= c0 ↔ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)), (topGen ` c1)⊆ c0)
  sseqtrd((topGen ` c1), c0, (topGen ` c0), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0))
  tgss(c0, ctop, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, (topGen ` c0)= c0)
  tgtop(c0)
  baib((topGen ` c1)⊆ c0, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
  eqss((topGen ` c1), c0)
  dfss3(s0, c0, (topGen ` c1))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), s0 ∈(topGen ` c1), ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1)))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (s0 ∈(topGen ` c1)↔ ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexg(c1, c0, ctop)
  eltg3(s1, c1, universe, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctg, c1)
  diff.ctg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bastop2
blocks.content: A version of ~ bastop1 that doesn't have ` B C_ J ` in the antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm bastop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))), wa(wss(c1, c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wss(c1, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wss(c1, c0))
  sseqtrd(c1, c0, cfv(ctg, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), wss(c1, cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c1, ctb))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), wcel(c1, ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, c1), ctop))
  biimparc(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(ctg, c1), ctop))
  eleq1(cfv(ctg, c1), c0, ctop)
  tgclb(c1)
  bastg(c1, ctb)
  simpr(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1)))))))
  bastop1(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bastop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →((topGen ` c1)= c0 ↔(c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1)))), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0))
  pm4.71rd(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c1 ⊆ c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c1 ⊆ c0)
  sseqtrd(c1, c0, (topGen ` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0), c1 ⊆(topGen ` c1), c1 ∈ TopBases)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Top ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0), c1 ∈ TopBases, (topGen ` c1)∈ Top)
  biimparc(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, (topGen ` c1)∈ Top)
  eleq1((topGen ` c1), c0, ctop)
  tgclb(c1)
  bastg(c1, ctb)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0)
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ⊆ c0, (topGen ` c1)= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1))))
  bastop1(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
